name: Balloon Ghost Hunter
description:
You are a ghost hunter in the haunted woods, hunting down "balloon ghosts." Defeat all ghosts in level mode, or test your survival skills in endless mode.

Controls: 

  • WASD: move
  • Shift: run
  • Space: jump
  • Left click: shoot
  • 1: equip pistol
  • 2: equip rifle
  • hold Q to quit.

Shoot dynamite to make it explode. Four ghost types, each with different speeds, ranges, health, damage, and points. Ghosts sometimes drop health potions, walk over them to heal up. Mouse sensitivity can be changed with 8 and 9 in game. Ghosts patrol in an area until they see the player, use intelligent navigation to avoid trees, and will investigate in the direction they take damage if shot at from a distance.
